nodes.text: The Cyborrean battlemount was a beast of burden native to Cyborrea used for military purposes. At the Second Battle of Vontor during the Xim Wars of 25,100 BBY, Jilruan mercenaries in the service of the Hutt Empire mounted on Cyborrean battlemounts decisively defeated the Duinarbulon Star Lancers of Xim the Despot.
